title: How much has life changed (for the ordinary person) over the last hundred years and what should we be trying to do over the next hundred years? - Quora

response.answer_text: Universal suffrage, Women not having to choose between marriage and a career, Being able to join a trade union, Sexism,Racism,Homophobic views becoming unacceptable (or less acceptable), Gay Marriage, Women Bishops. For the future maybe a real end to slavery and eradication of preventable diseases through programes like those put forward by Bill Gates?
